name: postman-api-tests
description: Postman API Tests vá»›i GitHub Actions CI/CD

scripts.test: newman run "Favorite API Tests - Data Driven.postman_collection.json" -e "Favorite API Environment.postman_environment.json"
scripts.test:post: newman run "Favorite API Tests - Data Driven.postman_collection.json" -e "Favorite API Environment.postman_environment.json" --iteration-data "data/post_favorite_test_data.csv"
scripts.test:get: newman run "Favorite API Tests - Data Driven.postman_collection.json" -e "Favorite API Environment.postman_environment.json" --iteration-data "data/get_favorite_test_data.csv"
scripts.test:delete: newman run "Favorite API Tests - Data Driven.postman_collection.json" -e "Favorite API Environment.postman_environment.json" --iteration-data "data/delete_favorite_test_data.csv"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:post && npm run test:get && npm run test:delete

author: Your Name
